Title: Nanbaka: Shusseki Bangou no Tsuita Baka-tachi!
Description: ['The official website for the Nanbaka television anime announced that the "Nanfes" event in April will screen a previously unreleased anime special.']
Voices: ['Uemura, Yuuto', 'Kobayashi, Daiki', 'Kakihara, Tetsuya', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Okuyama, Keito', 'Shiozaki, Ire', 'Akesaka, Satomi', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Tsuda, Kenjirou', 'Toyonaga, Toshiyuki']
